channel.title: Split graphics into 3D art and Signature art?
channel.description:
I like to look at peoples 3d creations, but i also hate when i find a title that sounds like its 3d and when i click on it it is a signature.
Couldn't it be
Graphics / | \ Signature art abstract 3d art
abstract for things that arent really either, etc. Or something for 2D and 3D art.

item.title: Split graphics into 3D art and Signature art?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:17, topic:187615”][me=Yz85Racer]notices how nearly every poster in this topic, - Frell, is a Graphics master.[/me]
Wow.[/quote]
I never was really in to c4d before, because it was hard modeling, but now NURBS makes it easy

And you aren’t, and neither is Jme

Read full topic

item.title: Split graphics into 3D art and Signature art?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I’ve seen people selling them $10-$100 a piece. They never sold one. I don’t see who would waste money on a signature, unless you’re buying the .psd for learning.

Read full topic

item.title: Split graphics into 3D art and Signature art?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

There is not enough 3D art or enough activity to split them into 2 different ones.

exe626:

Who cares about Javis? Just another person who’s gonna be just like Fellix and quit after a month, say he’s on some professional streak and making shit for profit.

Ha, that reminds me of this guy who said he made thousands a week making tags.

Funnier part was that I believed him.

Read full topic
